comment.author: 70986564@N00
comment._content: That's priceless. I heard the word computer was first applied to roomfuls of women doing computation.

comment.author: 48828195@N07
comment._content: Coincidence ! These were made in a factory about a mile from my house here in Birmingham.

comment.author: 44739231@N05
comment._content: Didn't 'computer' referred to the woman's role, as in the job title. Did men ever work as 'computers' I wonder?
